      • submit

        public java.lang.String submit(Command command)
        Submit the clients request to the server. Convert the request object to XML and submit it to the Server. Convert the Response XML to a response object and return it to the client.
        Parameters:
        command - String representation of the url
        request - Request object with information from the Client
        Returns:
        Response object from the server
